title: PRECEDE-PROCEED Model-Based Education Program for Improving Cause-of-Death Documentation

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Emphasizing the accuracy of death record-keeping and the importance of public health policy data during the COVID-19 pandemic

learning_goals: Learners can plan education design for mortality cause coding (MCCOD) by applying the 9 phases of the PRECEDE-PROCEED model
Learners can recognize "garbage code" issues and apply death cause recording methods compliant with WHO standards
Learners can analyze real cases using eLearning modules and propose strategies to improve public health data quality
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
